description: Skin Diamond aka ash makes her return to the House, but things have changed in her absence. The Steward start the evening by dismissing ash as a slave to the House. She is escorted out by buffy, and the evening gets started with a beautiful display of service to all of the guests by the rest of the slaves. Boot worship, spanking, humiliation, and tickling all by the guests with our slaves. Skin returns as her persona known as ‘Queen of Diamonds, and is given buffy to show her skills as a Domme. Skin shines with her new role while sadistically tormenting buffy. The night ends with an all out fuck fest involving all of the slaves and Skin pleasing Mr. Pierce, that turns the entire party into a sadistic orgy.
title: House Party:Diamonds from the Ash
